alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 3:39PM EDT until August 03 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Saluda County in central South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 339 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saluda County Airport, or 19 miles west of Batesburg-Leesville, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Saluda County Airport, Pleasant Lane, Northside Fire Station Main and Good Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
